name: Rubric Scorer
description: Designed by a teacher, for teachers.  FEATURES  Create rubrics up to size 20 rows x 10 columns  Sync class roster and grades with Google Classroom   View, print or email the PDF copy  Easy grading by touch  Share your rubric with other teachers  Easy feedback with custom and predefined comments  The free app supports up to 20 classes with 1 rubric each.   Consider activating a subscription to get these premium features.  More than 1 rubric per class  Bulk email grades rubrics to all students in a class  Generate a combined PDF with all rubric for all students in a class  Quick comments for all rubrics  Class statistics for all classes  Send feedback directly to the developer at inpocketsolution@gmail.com or through the feedback link in the app.
